rules.description: Home >> Ctrl + a (Start of Line) (Only in Terminal)
End >> Ctrl + e (End of Line) (Only in Terminal)
Ctrl + Shift + v >> Super + v (Paste) (Only in Terminal)
Ctrl + Shift + c >> Super + c (Copy) (Only in Terminal)
Super + Return >> Opens Terminal
Backspace >> Super + up (Go back) (Only in Finder)
Delete >> Super + backspace (Delete) (Only in Finder)
F2 >> Return (Rename) (Only in Finder)
Return >> Super + o (Open) (Only in Finder)
Ctrl + Shift + n >> Super + Shift + n (New Folder) (Only in Finder)
Super + q >> Super + w (Closes Finder) (Only in Finder)
Super + E >> Opens Finder
Ctrl + c,v,x >> Super + c,v,x (Copy/Paste/Cut) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + o >> Super + o (Open) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + b,i,u >> Super + b,i,u (Text Format) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + t >> Super + t (New Tab) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + r >> Super + r (Reload) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + n >> Super + n (New File) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + s >> Super + s (Save) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + a >> Super + a (Select All) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + z >> Super + z (Undo) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + Shift + z >> Super + Shift + z (Redo) (Except Vscode)
Ctrl + l >> Super + l (URL Location) (Only Browsers)
Ctrl + Shift + t >> Super + Shift + t (Reopen Tab) (Only Browsers)
Ctrl + -,+,0 >> Super + -,+,0 (Zoom) (Only Browsers and Vscode)
Ctrl + backspace,delete >> Ctrl + w, Alt + d (Only in Terminal and Vscode)
Home >> Super + left (Start of Line) (Default)
End >> Super + right (End of Line) (Default)
Ctrl (+ Shift) + left,right >> Alt (+ Shift) + left,right (Navigation and Selection) (Default)
Ctrl + w >> Super + w (Closes Windows) (Default)
Ctrl + f >> Super + f (Find) (Default)
Ctrl + Shift + Home,End >> Super + Shift + Home,End (Selection) (Default)
